articles.title: Slowing inflation piles pressure on central banks to pivot - Financial Times
articles.description: As clamour grows for interest rate cuts, investors fear acting too slowly could harm already weak economies
articles.content: Central bankers stand accused of reacting too slowly to signs that the inflation crisis is dissipating, less than two years after they were criticised for being late in responding to the most brutal … [+6646 chars]

articles.author: Amaka Nwaokocha
articles.title: UK Legislators urge caution in retail digital pound rollout - Cointelegraph
articles.description: UK legislators caution against hastily introducing a retail digital pound, emphasizing scrutiny of risks, costs, and privacy. The committee suggests limits and transparency.
